short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Probably the best mind sharing tool ever built

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
We as users, need a light weight yet convenient service to share what we read online, with what we highlight. It is always a chore to highlight the sentences we like, then take a screenshot, then send the screenshot through email or text messaging.

TinyShare automates this process.

TinyShare takes a screenshot, store it in the cloud, and return to you a shortened (tiny) URL that you can share with people.

Through email, sms, whatsapp, weChat, or any other messaging platform, someone receiving this short URL can easily view the screenshots of your highlights, either on a mobile device or desk top computer.
